title: Mia Chloe
author: Mia Chloe
content: The importance of news and information cannot be over emphasized especially in the crypto space. With the fast growing network of Bitcoin alot of things happen which as Bitcoin supporters we would like to know from time to time.Over time threads of many kinds have been created on this forum which served as a form of news Â to forum members in general. Here is a couple of them I could Â find on just the first page of the discussion board;El Salvador has become the first country to make #Bitcoin legal tender! ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡»Largest crypto exchange CEO arrested! Anyone getting deja vu?The recent arrest of the CEO of the largest cryptocurrency exchange . . .A news subboard would increase the rate at which more news updates on Bitcoin are shared in the forum.it would also organize the Â forum better.What do you think?

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: There is a child board for News and you just did not know about that board.Bitcoin Discussion > Press.I only see people less actively join topics in News board but they are more actively in Bitcoin Discussion main board.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: The press child board is not quite active like the main discussion board although it contains some elements of news.

comments.author: BlackBoss_

I understand you're trying to make a useful impact but this forum have lasted for a decade and more and updates and/or news have been taking place if it was so important for news of such as mentioned above to have a sub-board it would have been done, because it's not too relevant or it has been covered by offtopics and other board that is why it has not been included as a sub-board of it's own.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Bitcoin Discussion is suitable for such topics, since during the day there will be one or two major events, and all the news sites transmit this news, as 99.9999% is repeated and all of them are based on one source, and even the style of writing the news is the same, so that even for large news sites, if they publish false news, all of these sites will transmit it.
